fields.summary: Improve warning when automatic ctor/dtor are enabled

status.description: The issue is open and awaits assignment.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: Improve warning when automatic ctor/dtor are enabled

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: This issue is being actively worked on at the moment by the assignee.
status.name: In Progress

fields.customfield_10312: The HP Gallery will have the same SRP tile.
fields.description:
Update Vivanuncios Homepage Gallery to have same SRP tile and carousel.

*Desktop*
 [https://zpl.io/adAzmPE] 1279 browser width, 920 content width
 [https://zpl.io/25Ekjw8] 1280 browser width, 1240 content width

*Mobile*
 [https://zpl.io/VKGnOG7]

 

We will use lazy load for all of the ads in the gallery. Once the user clicks the arrow in the carousel, then we load the next sets of the ad.
fields.summary: Improve warning when automatic ctor/dtor are enabled

comments.body: I asked [~ngarga] on the implementation of the carousel. Nacer has built the SRP tile style that we can use for the implementation of the gallery ad tiles. For the carousel, he only has the frameworks, but will need us to build ourselves. [~spliu].

items.fromString:

*Desktop*
zpl.io/adAzmPE 1279 browser width, 920 content width
zpl.io/25Ekjw8    1280 browser width, 1240 content width

*Mobile*
zpl.io/VKGnOG7
